column1: The Pit Room////This place exceeds all the hype.  The food is so good here.  I had their homemade sausage and their Frito Pie (Frito chips topped with their homemade chili).  The pork sausage was a jalapeno and cheddar filled sausage.  It was so good.  The beef was also good
column2: but wasn't as flavorful as the pork.  All was excellent.  It's in downtown Houston.  Next time I'm in the area again I'm definitely going back.
